entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.17.0
entry.content:
Highlights

Here are some of the highlights this release.

New logo!

Thanks to Trailmix we got a new great looking icon. After a vote in the Discord this one won:

Live TV

Initial support for streaming Live TV. No recordings, or starting recordings yet.

Background downloads using the optimize server (optional)

While we don't want to introduce other programs in order to use this app fully, we have created a sidecar program called "optimized versions server". It's optional to use and we still support and continue to improve the normal way of downloading content in the app.

This containerized program takes an HLS stream from Jellyfin and combines it into a single file (just like how downloads in the Streamyfin app works today). The benefit of a server is that the single combined file allows for background downloads in the app for both iOS and Android. Just click download, minimize the app, and wait for the notification.

What's Changed

  • feat: live-tv support by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/156
  • chore: refactor player logic (video, music, live-tv) by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/165
  • fix: removed resumable items from next up by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/163
  • feat: background downloads by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/140
  • feat: set downloads button to purple if downloads exist by @Simon-Eklundh in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/142
  • feat: added support for more libraries to use the recently added section by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/151
  • feat: go (manually and automatically) to the next episode when progress reaches end

What's fixed

  • fix: posters clipping and not clickable on home and search page
  • fix: fade in/out player when starting video
  • fix: trying to delete a video would cause the video to play when releasing the finger (android)
  • fix: small design improvements
  • fix: music player now works again

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.21.0
entry.content:
This release includes a new native VLC player that supports almost all codecs and formats for both Android and iOS. This means you can probably direct stream anything! Selecting lower bitrates is still available for those who want or need it, of course.

We also have more features and bug fixes that have been delayed due to the significance of this release, so please be patient if your bug or feature is not included yet! However, please report any issues you have by opening an issue here on GitHub.

The release is available on Play Store (2 Dec) and soon on the App Store.

Please join our Discord for beta updates, feature requests, and more: Join here

What's Changed

  • feat: native tabbar by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/166
  • feat: new vlc player by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/178
  • fix: update visual playback when exiting video by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/181
  • feat: vlc support for android by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/226
  • fix: some edge cases with dropdown by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/234
  • feat: added change to show actual device name rather than platform by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/235

Known problems

  • Some Android devices have issues with rotation in combination with Controls in the video player
  • Slow loading times for certain video codecs/formats

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/compare/v0.18.0...v0.21.0
